蓬.definition: fleabane (family Asteraceae); disheveled; classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff

蓬亂.definition: matted (of straw or hair); unkempt; overgrown; scraggly; thatch

蓬壺.definition: fabled island in Eastern sea, abode of immortals; same as Penglai 蓬萊|蓬莱

蓬安.definition: Peng'an county in Nanchong 南充[Nan2 chong1], Sichuan

蓬安縣.definition: Peng'an county in Nanchong 南充[Nan2 chong1], Sichuan

蓬戶.definition: thatched house; poor person's house; humble home

蓬戶甕牖.definition: thatched house, broken urn windows (idiom); poor person's house; humble home

蓬江.definition: Pengjiang district of Jiangmen city 江門市|江门市, Guangdong

蓬江區.definition: Pengjiang district of Jiangmen city 江門市|江门市, Guangdong

蓬溪.definition: Pengxi county in Suining 遂寧|遂宁[Sui4 ning2], Sichuan

蓬溪縣.definition: Pengxi county in Suining 遂寧|遂宁[Sui4 ning2], Sichuan

蓬篳生光.definition: Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling

蓬茸.definition: lush; luxuriant (of grass or hair); soft lush hair

蓬萊.definition: (Chinese mythology) Penglai, one of three fabled islands in the Bohai sea, where immortals were said to live; (by extension) fairyland

蓬蓽生光.definition: Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling

蓬蓽生輝.definition: Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling; see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]

蓬門篳戶.definition: overgrown gate, wicker windows (idiom); poor person's house; humble home

蓬門蓽戶.definition: overgrown gate, wicker windows (idiom); poor person's house; humble home

蓬頭垢面.definition: messy hair and dirty face; bad appearance

蓬頭跣足.definition: matted hair and bare feet; unkempt

蓬首垢面.definition: lit. with disheveled hair and a dirty face; of unkempt appearance (idiom)
